recommendations: Add Hugging Face style metadata: set model_type to 'gpt_oss' and include rope_scaling {type: 'yarn', factor: 32.0, original_max_position_embeddings: 4096} in config.json before converting.
Provide tokenizer assets (GPT-2 vocab/merges or tokenizer.json) for GPT-OSS; place them under models/gpt-oss-20b/original and rerun scripts/convert_safetensors_to_gguf.ps1.
